code: import api from'../api/axios';export const cartService={async getCart(){const response=await api.get('/cart');return response.data;},async addToCart(productId){let quantity=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;const response=await api.post('/cart/items',{product_id:productId,quantity});return response.data;},async updateCartItem(itemId,quantity){const response=await api.put("/cart/items/".concat(itemId),{quantity});return response.data;},async removeFromCart(itemId){await api.delete("/cart/items/".concat(itemId));},async clearCart(){await api.delete('/cart');}};
